interfaces

Interface PosUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyView, MainUI

    public interface PosUI
    Interface specification for WooPOS user interfaces.
    Author:
    kalle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generatePaymentButtons(List<PaymentMethod> paymentMethods, ActionListener listener)
      Generate the UI widgets for taking payments.
      void generateProductButtons(List<Product> products, ActionListener listener)
      Generate the UI widgets for adding products to the shopping cart.
      void onPosClose(WooPOS applicationContext)
      Method that is called during POS close/shutdown.
      void onPosStartup(WooPOS applicationContext)
      Method that is called during POS startup.
      void setShoppingCartContentDisplay(ShoppingCart cart)
      Method for changing the contents of the UI widget that displays the current contents of the shopping cart.

        Method that is called during POS startup.

        Method that is called during POS close/shutdown.

      • generateProductButtons

        void generateProductButtons(List<Product> products,
                            ActionListener listener)
        Generate the UI widgets for adding products to the shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        products - a list of Products.
        listener - an event Listener for add to cart button clicks.

      • generatePaymentButtons

        void generatePaymentButtons(List<PaymentMethod> paymentMethods,
                            ActionListener listener)
        Generate the UI widgets for taking payments.
        Parameters:
        paymentMethods - a list of PaymentMethods.
        listener - an event Listener for create payment button clicks.

      • setShoppingCartContentDisplay

        void setShoppingCartContentDisplay(ShoppingCart cart)
        Method for changing the contents of the UI widget that displays the current contents of the shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        cart - a ShoppingCart with contents to be displayed.
